vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.5.1
Also named: chag.gay (חַגַּי "Haggai" H2292B)
§ Haggai = "festive"
1) 10th in order of the minor prophets; first prophet to prophecy after the captivity
2) son of Gad
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈該 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "節慶"
小先知書中的第十位; 被擄後第一位發預言的先知
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
哈该 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "节庆"
小先知书中的第十位; 被掳后第一位发预言的先知

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.5.1
Aramaic of chag.gay (חַגַּי "Haggai" H2292A)
§ Haggai = "festive"
10th in order of the minor prophets; first prophet to prophecy after the captivity (in Aramaic writings)
